page.title: 11LIVING ON THE ESTATE
page.content: I stay in Inchinnan Estate.With no amenities here it's very boring.There are no shops or post offices,and there is only a bus every hour which doesn't come after 5.30pm.If we go to any parties or discos our parents have to take and collect us from the place we've been to. We have to travel to school in the morning and back at night.This means we have to get up early in the morning and get back late at night.In the winter after school we don't get out at night because when we get back from school it's very dark. Our doctor is in Renfrew which means he has to travel quite a distance if we're ill.We haven't a car so if we've to go to the doctor it's quite a lot of money for the bus fares.
